bibl.title: Four (Three?) Ptolemaic Letters from the Duke University Papyrus Archive.
bibl.note: Documents belonging to a cache of papyri (P. Duk. Inv. 313-323) of apparently Arsinoite provenance. - Inv. 319. II B.C. - Inv. 321. II B.C. - Inv. 323. II B.C. - Inv. 322. III-II B.C. - P. Duk. Inv. 321 and 323 are perhaps two halves of the same papyrus.
bibl.seg: Bauschatz John, Four (Three?) Ptolemaic Letters from the Duke University Papyrus Archive.

Documents belonging to a cache of papyri (P. Duk. Inv. 313-323) of apparently Arsinoite provenance. - Inv. 319. II B.C. - Inv. 321. II B.C. - Inv. 323. II B.C. - Inv. 322. III-II B.C. - P. Duk. Inv. 321 and 323 are perhaps two halves of the same papyrus.
